name: Equilibrium (Nik Chernyakov)
description:
Equilibrium

First person arena shooter where player will try to protect his crystal from enemies and destroy their crystals. Player can manipulate with his and crystal HP and improve his abilities with experience gathered from the killed enemies. Challenge yourself to defeat arena as quick as possible. Best results are shown in the leaderboard.

Controls:
  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Mouse Button - Shoot
  • Q - Sacrifice player's HP to the crystal
  • E - Restore player's and crystal's HP (Can use only near the crystal) 
  • R - Reload the gun
  • Space - Jump
  • Tab - Open abilities menu
  • Esc - Pause
